Pre-Game Insights: Salvador Perez and the Kansas City Royals will take on the Cleveland Guardians and Jose Ramirez at Kauffman Stadium on Wednesday at 7:40 p.m. ET.
The pitching staff for the Royals has a collective 8.2 K/9, which ranks 24th in MLB.
The Guardians’ .239 batting average ranks 21st in the league this season.
Royals are favorites with odds of -136, while the Guardians are underdogs with odds of +115.
The over/under for the game is set at 8.5.
